Hi. Is anywone has an idea how to do the following thing. I hava an email made in figma and exported to HubSpot wih use of emailfy. That email have a button (not HubSpot made button) Under that button i want to have a url but that url should be taken from propertly, I tried to to it like this;  <a href="{{ personalization_token('deal.custom_link') }}" target="_blank" but the link is not taken to email once i test it
